    engine.math  

    • Uses of MathException in engine.math

      Methods in engine.math that throw MathException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BoundingBox BoundingBox.getCenteredInstance(Vector2D center, float width, float height)
      This returns a BoundingBox of the given width and height, centered at the given Vector2D.
      void BoundingBox.setHeight(float newHeight)
      Changes the total height of the BoundingBox.
      void BoundingBox.setHeightCentered(float newHeight)
      Changes the total height of the BoundingBox.
      void BoundingBox.setWidthCentered(float newWidth)
      Changes the total width of the BoundingBox.
      void BoundingBox.setX1(float x, boolean maintainSize)
      Changes the x coordinate of the top left corner of this BoundingBox.
      void BoundingBox.setX2(float x, boolean maintainSize)
      Changes the x coordinate of the bottom right corner of this BoundingBox.
      void BoundingBox.setY1(float y, boolean maintainSize)
      Changes the y coordinate of the top left corner of this BoundingBox.
      void BoundingBox.setY2(float y, boolean maintainSize)
      Changes the y coordinate of the bottom right corner of this BoundingBox.
      Constructors in engine.math that throw MathException 
      Constructor and Description
      BoundingBox(float leftX, float topY, float width, float height)
      Constructs a BoundingBox by specifying the topleft coordinates and the width and height.
